io.scanbot.sdk.persistence

Interface PageStorage


  • public PageStorage

    Interface providing easy methods to work with Page image objects

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.File getDocumentImage(java.lang.String pageId)
      Provides File of the document image.
      java.io.File getDocumentImagePreview(java.lang.String pageId)
      Provides File of the document preview image.
      java.io.File getFilteredImagePreview(java.lang.String pageId, ImageFilterType filterType)
      Provides File containing page preview with applied enum ImageFilterType

      Provides File of the original image.
      java.io.File getOriginalImagePreview(java.lang.String pageId)
      Provides File of the original preview image.
      java.io.File getPageDir(java.lang.String pageId)
      Provides directory to save image files for current Page
      java.io.File getPagesDirectory()
      Provides directory which store all pages
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getStoredPages()
      Provides List with all pageIds
      java.io.File getUnfilteredDocumentImage(java.lang.String pageId)
      Provides File of the unfiltered document image.
      java.io.File getUnfilteredDocumentImagePreview(java.lang.String pageId)
      Provides File of the unfiltered document preview image.
